messages.subject: New Japanese Site
messages.msgSnippet: Many Japanese fandom sites have gone semi-dormant now but this is what seems to be a new site.  Very sleek and we can hope for some nice updates.  It combines
messages.messageBody:
Many Japanese fandom sites have gone semi-dormant now but
this is what seems to be a new site. Very sleek and we can hope for
some nice updates. It combines Aizu with the Shinsengumi as you can
tell from the address

http://aizu-shinsengumi.jp/

they need fanart! (^_^)
and fanfic pronto!

as for SHQ website info we just decided on the search engine logic
this Saturday and apparently the slow progress is because I can't
keyword all the images and webpages fast enough...::nervous laugh::
it's very tedious work
